languages.text: "Мне передали отчеты Скаландра, которые он не успел отправить. Согласно им активность ксеносов резко снизилась после вашего отбытия в Цинерус Малефикум. Учитывая масштабы рейда на Даргонус, можно предположить, что {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} использовали для атаки все имеющиеся в их распоряжении силы — возможно, теперь они потратят какое-то время на их восстановление. Сейчас Ахиллеас оправляется после тяжелых ран, и без его помощи мы временно слепы против этого врага Человечества. Однако наши стратеги все же испытывают надежду на перерыв в атаках и рейдах — достаточный для того, чтобы набраться сил для новой войны".

"I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."
languages.original_text: "Мне передали отчеты Скаландра, которые он не успел отправить. Согласно им активность ксеносов резко снизилась после вашего отбытия в Цинерус Малефикум. Учитывая масштабы рейда на Даргонус, можно предположить, что {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} использовали для атаки все имеющиеся в их распоряжении силы — возможно, теперь они потратят какое-то время на их восстановление. Сейчас Ахиллеас оправляется после тяжелых ран, и без его помощи мы временно слепы против этого врага Человечества. Однако наши стратеги все же испытывают надежду на перерыв в атаках и рейдах — достаточный для того, чтобы набраться сил для новой войны".

traits.locale_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are, for the time being, blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."

"I was handed Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. According to them, xeno activity dropped sharply after you departed for Cineris Malificum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the Drukhari used up all forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Without Achilleas' aid we are blind to the scheming of these enemies of Mankind, but our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids-that will allow us to gather strength for a new conflict."

languages.text: “斯卡兰德的报告未能及时传到我这里，我刚刚才收到这份报告。报告表明，当您出发前往苍灰恶咒之后，异形的活动程度急剧下降。考虑到袭击达戈努斯敌人的数量，几乎可以肯定，{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}已经耗尽了他们所有的力量，可能要过段时间才能卷土重来。如今，阿吉里亚斯受了重伤，正在休息。失去了他的协助，我们暂时无法提前察觉人类之敌的阴谋。不过，我们的战略大师认为敌人的攻击与突袭会暂时停歇一段时间。我们可以利用这个机会蓄积力量，为接下来的冲突做好准备。”
languages.original_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."

traits.locale_text: “斯卡兰德的报告未能及时传到我这里，我刚刚才收到这份报告。报告表明，当您出发前往苍灰恶咒之后，异形的活动程度急剧下降。考虑到袭击达戈努斯敌人的数量，几乎可以肯定，{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}已经耗尽了他们所有的力量，可能要过段时间才能卷土重来。如今，阿吉里亚斯受了重伤，正在休息。失去了他的协助，我们暂时无法提前察觉人类之敌的阴谋。不过，我们的战略大师认为敌人的攻击与突袭会暂时停歇一段时间。我们可以利用这个机会蓄积力量，为接下来的冲突做好准备。”

languages.text: «He recibido los informes que Scalander no llegó a entregar a tiempo. Indican que la actividad xenos descendió drásticamente cuando partió hacia el Cinerus Maleficum. Dada la escala de la incursión contra Dargonus, podemos asumir que los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} emplearon todas las fuerzas a su disposición... y ahora necesitarán tiempo para reponer las pérdidas. Achilleas se está recuperando de las terribles heridas que sufrió y, sin su ayuda, no podemos ver los planes de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Sin embargo, nuestros estrategas anticipan una interrupción de los ataques y las incursiones que nos permitirá recuperar fuerzas».
languages.original_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."

traits.locale_text: «He recibido los informes que Scalander no llegó a entregar a tiempo. Indican que la actividad xenos descendió drásticamente cuando partió hacia el Cinerus Maleficum. Dada la escala de la incursión contra Dargonus, podemos asumir que los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} emplearon todas las fuerzas a su disposición... y ahora necesitarán tiempo para reponer las pérdidas. Achilleas se está recuperando de las terribles heridas que sufrió y, sin su ayuda, no podemos ver los planes de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Sin embargo, nuestros estrategas anticipan una interrupción de los ataques y las incursiones que nos permitirá recuperar fuerzas».

languages.text: "Ich habe die Berichte von Scalander erhalten, die er nicht rechtzeitig abgeliefert hat. Sie besagen, dass die Xenos-Aktivitäten stark abgenommen haben, nachdem Sie zum Cinerus Maleficum aufgebrochen sind. In Anbetracht des Ausmaßes des Dargonus-Angriffs kann man davon ausgehen, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} alle ihnen zur Verfügung stehenden Kräfte aufgebraucht haben — und nun einige Zeit benötigen, um die Verluste wieder auszugleichen. Achilleas erholt sich von seinen schweren Verletzungen, und ohne ihn sind wir vorübergehend blind für die Intrigen dieser Feinde der Menschheit. Unsere Strategen hoffen jedoch immer noch auf eine Flaute der Angriffe und Überfälle, die es uns erlaubt, unsere Kräfte für einen neuen Konflikt zu sammeln."
languages.original_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."

Sie besagen, dass die Xenos-Aktivitäten stark abgenommen haben, nachdem Sie zum Cinerus Maleficum aufgebrochen sind. In Anbetracht des Ausmaßes des Dargonus-Angriffs kann man davon ausgehen, dass die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} alle ihnen zur Verfügung stehenden Kräfte aufgebraucht haben — und nun einige Zeit benötigen, um die Verluste wieder auszugleichen. Achilleas erholt sich von seinen schweren Verletzungen, und ohne ihn sind wir vorübergehend blind für die Intrigen dieser Feinde der Menschheit. languages.text: « J'ai enfin reçu les rapports que Scalander n'a pas pu nous faire parvenir à temps. Ils stipulent que l'activité des xénos s'est effondrée après votre départ pour le Cinerus Maleficum. Considérant l'ampleur du raid contre Dargonus, on peut raisonnablement supposer que les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g} ont utilisé toutes les troupes à leur disposition... et vont devoir reconstituer leurs rangs. Achilleas est actuellement en convalescence, et sans son aide, nous sommes aveugles aux manigances de ces ennemis de l'humanité, mais nos stratèges espèrent voir une accalmie sur le front des attaques et des raids. Cela nous permettrait de reprendre des forces en vue d'un nouveau conflit. »
languages.original_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."

Cela nous permettrait de reprendre des forces en vue d'un nouveau conflit. »

languages.text: 「スカランダーから、期限内に届けられなかった報告書を受け取りました。そこには、あなたがサイネラス・マレフィカムへと出発した後、異種族の活動が急激に低下したと記されています。ダルゴナスへの襲撃規模を踏まえると、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}が利用可能な戦力をすべて投入したと考えるのが妥当でしょう。そして現在、損耗を補うための時間を要している可能性があります。アキレアスは現在、重傷からの回復中であり、彼の支援なくしては、我々は人類の敵の陰謀に対して一時的に盲目の状態にあります。それでもなお、我らの戦略班は襲撃と攻撃が一時的に収まることを期待しており、その間に次なる戦いに向けて戦力を集結させるつもりです。」
languages.original_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."

traits.locale_text: 「スカランダーから、期限内に届けられなかった報告書を受け取りました。そこには、あなたがサイネラス・マレフィカムへと出発した後、異種族の活動が急激に低下したと記されています。ダルゴナスへの襲撃規模を踏まえると、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}が利用可能な戦力をすべて投入したと考えるのが妥当でしょう。そして現在、損耗を補うための時間を要している可能性があります。アキレアスは現在、重傷からの回復中であり、彼の支援なくしては、我々は人類の敵の陰謀に対して一時的に盲目の状態にあります。それでもなお、我らの戦略班は襲撃と攻撃が一時的に収まることを期待しており、その間に次なる戦いに向けて戦力を集結させるつもりです。」

languages.text: "Scalander'ın zamanında iletmeyi başaramadığı raporlar elime ulaştı. Siz Cinerus Maleficum'a gitmek üzere ayrılır ayrılmaz zeno faaliyetlerinin keskin bir şekilde azaldığını işaret ediyor. Dargonus baskınının çapı düşünüldüğünde, {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharilerin{/g} ellerindeki tüm gücü kullandıklarını varsaymak mantıksız olmaz ve şu anda kayıplarının yerini doldurmak için zamana ihtiyaç duyuyor olabilirler. Achilleas şu anda ağır yaralarını sarmaya çalışıyor. Onun yardımı olmadan İnsanlığın düşmanlarının dümenlerine karşı gözlerimiz geçici olarak kör durumda. Fakat stratejistlerimiz, yine de saldırılarda ve baskınlarda bir azalma olacağını umut ediyor. Bu da gücümüzü toplayıp yeni bir çarpışmaya hazırlanmak için bize zaman kazandıracaktır."
languages.original_text: "I have been given Scalander's reports that he failed to deliver in time. They indicate that xenos activity dropped sharply after you departed for the Cinerus Maleficum. Considering the scale of the Dargonus raid, it is safe to assume the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} used up all the forces at their disposal — and may now require some time to replenish the losses. Achilleas is presently recuperating from his severe wounds, and without his aid, we are temporarily blind to the scheming of these enemies of Humanity. However, our strategists are still hoping for a lull in attacks and raids, which will allow us to gather our strength for a new conflict."
